bug.author: MikalaiDrabovich
bug.description: Looks like there is a comma missing in: "A tensor has a static type a rank, and a shape" <denchmark-link:http://tensorflow.org/get_started/basic_usage.html#tensors>http://tensorflow.org/get_started/basic_usage.html#tensors</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: Thanks! We'll update the docs accordingly.
